title: Sound On: Crypto Warning, Delta Covid Variant
itunes:title: Sound On: Crypto Warning, Delta Covid Variant
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Bloomberg SEC reporter Ben Bain, Republican Arizona Congressman David Schweikert, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. Bloomberg Correspondent Erik Schatzker discussed his exclusive interview with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
